text: These are the words of Amos, who was among the sheepherders 1:1 Or sheep breeders of Tekoaâ€”what he saw concerning Israel two years 1:1 Or during the two years before the earthquake, in the days when Uzziah was king of Judah and Jeroboam son of Jehoash 1:1 Hebrew Joash, a variant of Jehoash was king of Israel.
